description: The image features a cartoon-style drawing of a playful nun with a mischievous expression. She has striking, platinum blonde hair styled in large, flirty curls. She wears a traditional nun's habit in shades of purple, complete with a white wimple framing her face. One eye is closed in a wink, while the other wide, blue eye glints with amusement. Her lips are bright red and curved into a knowing smile, accentuated by a small beauty mark on her cheek. She is making hand gestures, pointing at the viewer with one hand while giving a thumbs up with the other. Her fingernails on the pointing hand are painted black. A pendant depicting a stylized, golden heart with a bright red center hangs from her neck.
